content: This should be an uncontroversial PR which simplifies a proof by using better API. This theorem happens to also be touched by some of my other PRs, so I'd like to get this initial cleanup out of the way early.
Delegated. Unrelated: could you please expand the docstring for ≤ on PGames? It says what 0 ≤ x means but doesn't say how it extends to all PGames.
It's a bit of a doozy, and I think the best way to explain it is that x ≤ y means 0 ≤ y - x.
